titleStmt.title: Hudibras on Calamy's imprisonment, and Wild's poetry. To the bishops
titleStmt.author: Sacheverell, George.

notesStmt.note: Verse: MOst Reverend Lords, the Churches Joy and Wonder ...
In this edition, the "M" in "MOst", on the first line of text, is unornamented, and "Finis" is under the second column.
A satire on two Puritan divines ejected under the Act of Uniformity, 1662.
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library and British Library.
